title: Specification of some parameters of the simulation
description: Specification of some parameters of the simulation

dt.description: Minimum time unit simulated by the framework

mesh_step.description: Minimum physical size unit simulated by the framework

simulate_thermal.description: True if want to simulate the thermal model

dt_fragmentation_processor_task.description: When simulate the processor model, dt will be fragmented in little parts to obtain a better result (Euler)

dt_fragmentation_thermal.description: When simulate the thermal model, dt will be fragmented in little parts to obtain a better result (Euler)

float_decimals_precision.description: Number of decimal precision to maintain while doing float comparisons

type_precision.description: Float type selected, higher precision implies more resources consumption and long simulation time
